utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: You are very beautiful, Nikki Heat. It is too bad I have to kill you now. Uglier men than you have tried, Draco. You have slapped me. Now I will have to –

utterance.speaker: MARTHA RODGERS
utterance.content: Playing with dolls, are we?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: These are action figures.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m using them to envision a scene. I owe a few chapters of Frozen Heat to my editor and I’ve not been able to write a page.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Maybe a case with Beckett will be able to spark … something.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s prepping for a trial. Is that the mail?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Yeah. Thank God Alexis is finally getting some college acceptance letters. Her friends started getting them weeks ago.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Richard Castle, what on Earth are you playing at?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t want Alexis to have to live through that Stanford rejection nightmare again so I’m holding the letters. This way she gets them all at once and she’ll get all the good news with the bad.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Richard, that is the dumbest idea you’ve ever had. Now, you’ve got to give her these letters before she has a nervous breakdown.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay. I will. I will. Though you have to admit, watching her have a nervous breakdown is pretty funny.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Unlike yours. Now, what are we going to do about your writing?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, I don’t know. I just need something … different. Something new. Something like … … severed heads.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Severed heads?

utterance.speaker: NEWSCASTER
utterance.content: The victim was found shot to death after midnight. According to police, his bag contained 3 severed heads.

utterance.speaker: NEWSCASTER
utterance.content: Detective Slaughter, what can you tell us about –

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Get that camera out of my face before I put a bullet in it!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, oh, oh… Mother, forget severed heads. I want to meet that guy.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Well you already have a muse, darling.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes well, muses are to provide inspiration and right now I ain’t getting’ any. So, Detective Nikki Heat, meet Detective Slaughter.

utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: You know what? Put that in the conference room. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey, Castle. What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I just haven’t seen you in a few days, thought I’d drop by, see how you’re doing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you, that’s so sweet. Um, I’m great, actually. The trial prep is going really well, I’ve been getting home at a decent hour, and… It’s great to see you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s good to see you, too. Hey, listen. Do you know anything about this gang cop named Slaughter?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The severed heads homicide? That’s why you’re here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, no. I mean, just since you’re busy prepping for the trial I just thought I’d look into this Slaughter guy, get a sense of who he is for the background research … the … the … Unless that’s a problem.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. Not a problem.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Great. So … where would I find him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wherever the body is?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Darling, you might as well confess. I know you killed him so we could spend some quality time together.

utterance.speaker: LAURA
utterance.content: Not even if you were the last man on Earth.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Not up to the challenge?

utterance.speaker: LAURA
utterance.content: How about we skip the macho fantasy and I just tell you cause of death?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Let me guess. Lead poisoning?

utterance.speaker: LAURA
utterance.content: Three shots to the chest. Most likely died of blood loss within minutes.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Always figured Glitch’d end up on this table. Glitch. It’s his street name, on account of he’s such a screw up. You fish the slugs out for me? Ah, see? You do love me. 32s I’m guessing?

utterance.speaker: LAURA
utterance.content: You’re talking about the bullets, right?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Aren’t you gonna ask about the heads?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Who the hell are you?

utterance.speaker: LAURA
utterance.content: That’s Castle. He’s a writer. And he consults with the 12th.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s weird. You can tell they aren’t fresh. You can smell it. Formaldehyde with a sous-jacent of decay. Judging from the dirt in the hair, I’d say our victim dug the bodies up and then cut the heads off.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah, no kidding, Sherlock. I already got unis checking out the local cemeteries. Not that it’s any of your business.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Rick Castle. And like Laura said, I work out of the 1-2 with Detective Beckett. Here’s the thing. I was hoping I could ride along with you on this one. Just for a day or two.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I need a writer hanging around like I need a case of the crabs.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s – What can I say to change your mind?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well, that is a very fine coat.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And it would look fabulous on you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So, are we good?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: No. See you later, gorgeous.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You said I could ride along if I gave you my coat.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I never said that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It was implied.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Look, I work alone. Nothing you can say is going to change that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m friends with the Mayor!

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And seeing as how I’m asking you for a favor here, that would mean that I owe you one in return.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well … any friend of the Mayor is a friend of mine.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What’s our first move?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Break the news to Glitch’s dad.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That was awesome! Beckett never drives on the sidewalk.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You’re gonna hang with me, we’re gonna lay out some ground rules. Rule number one, do not use the word ‘awesome’. You’re a grown man. Rule number two, stay out of my way.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Is that it?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: It’s kind of all encompassing.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This is the hardest part of the job, breaking the news to the family. So what’s your style? Terse, yet compassionate? Sensitive but strong?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Brian! Glitch is in the morgue. Someone pumped 3 rounds into him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh … sorry for your loss.

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: My what? My loss? Who the hell are you to talk about my loss?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Your boy was into something bad. Worse than usual. What do you know about it?

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: And why would I tell you even if I knew?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well it involved cutting the heads off of dead guys. It sounded like your boy’s brand of stupid.

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: My son was a simple lad operating in difficult times. You disparage his memory at your peril. Now, I’ve gotta go tell his mom. Make arrangements.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s a hard man.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah, you don’t get to be top breaker leg breaker in the Westies by being soft.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No wonder he didn’t give us anything useful.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Never thought he would. He’s a “take the law into your own hands” kind of guy.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You think he’s going to hunt down Glitch’s killer himself.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah. And we’re gonna follow him. Tricky part is going to be interceding before he kills the guy. Let’s go. He’s on the move.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where do you think he’s going?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I don’t know. That’s why we’re following him.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah? Outstanding. Unis found the cemetery where Glitch got the heads 4 blocks from the crime scene. Uh huh. Thanks brother.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Go back to the office, run these names down, figure out who these heads belong to.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why wait when I can have my team run them right now?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You got a team?

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I am texting you three names, all recently deceased. I need you to run ‘em for me.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Beckett’s not working a case right now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. I’m running and gunning with Slaughter from Gangs.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Have him run the names. I don’t work for you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah, Esposito. You are too funny!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He’s there, isn’t he?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh huh.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: All right. If you want me to make you look good, it’s gonna cost. Front row Knicks tickets.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sounds good.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Oh, and uh … you boy Slaughter? He’s got quite a reputation in Gangs. His nickname is The Widowmaker. His last three partners were killed in the line of duty.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: All good?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You think one of those guys could be the killer?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Nah… he’s just trolling for info. Which means we watch and wait.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh, no thanks. Okay, sure.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So… they call you the Widowmaker.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Hey, not my fault they keep sticking me with idiots. Speaking of partners, I’ve seen pictures of yours. She’s smoking hot.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You’re tappin’ that, right?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What? No.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: No? What wrong with you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There’s - - nothing wrong with me. We’re just friends.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Man needs a friend he gets a dog. A woman like that, you storm the beaches or die trying. C’mon. He’s heading into that bar. Show time.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You packing?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Packing? No, I’m not a cop. My vest says writer on it.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Rule number three, you ride with me, you ride strapped. C’mon.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! What about regulations?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You signed a waiver, didn’t ya? Okay, you take the front, I’ll go in the back.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Shouldn’t we call for backup?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You got a skirt that says writer on it, too?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: C’mon. Give me 10 seconds and go in hard, yelling ‘NYPD’, The louder the better.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: NPYD! Associate civilian investigator! Nobody move!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Drop the gun, dirtbag!

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: What did you call me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Dirt – dirtbag. Dirtbag.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Shh. Drop it. Or your wife will be getting a volume discount at the mortuary. C’mon. Sit down.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Get him, Sherlock!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t got him, I don’t got him!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: A little help?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You’re doing fine.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well done, Sherlock. ‘atta boy.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: What’s this I hear about Castle researching with another cop?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Don’t you have some 5s to fill out?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well I’m sure it’s just a phase. You know Castle. He’s probably caught up in the severed heads and the rush of the gangster squad –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t care what he’s wrapped up in, just so long as he stays out of my hair. Thanks.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Put him on ice for me.

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: Shay, keep it in the family, huh?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Where’s interrogation?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Right through. First door, right there.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: C’mon, you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What the hell happened?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You should have seen it. Slaughter got the drop on the one guy but the other guy tried to make a break for it. I had to take his ass down.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You what? Are you kidding me? You’re a writer, Castle, not a cop.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, I can take care of myself. You just never give me a chance.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, because I’m not trying to get you killed. And what is he doing using our box?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I invited him to.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, that’s not your place.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I didn’t think you’d mind. Besides, guys like Slaughter? They just float from precinct to precinct, you know? They’re like nomads, wandering the streets of New York City, kicking ass and taking names. Which isn’t the most original turn of phrase, but the character is so great. It’s really going to help me shake up this next Nikki Heat book.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, sure. If you live long enough to actually write about it.

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: I didn’t kill Glitch.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Then why did his father come after you?

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: I don’t know. But you gotta convince him that I’m innocent.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: No, no, no, no. You gotta convince me or I’m gonna park you in holding and sit back and marvel at how Brian removes your limbs with his bare hands.

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: I was at my sister’s house on Long Island last night. You can call and ask her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So why does Brian think you killed his son?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really, Shay? Want me to bust out Jake and the Fat Man again?

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: Brian heard me and Glitch had a falling out, but we didn’t. It’s just… Finn Rourke told us to stay away from him.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: The head of the Westies made you freeze Glitch out? Why?

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: He screwed up another job last week. He abandoned a truck full of stolen medical equipment on the FDR after he ran out of gas. The only reason Finn didn’t have Glitch killed was Brian. ‘cause he knew he was crazy enough to go after him if anything happened to his kid.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why did Glitch have a bag full of heads?

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: No clue.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: When was the last time you saw him?

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: Two days ago. Said he was going to do something to get back in good with the Westies.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Did he say what it was?

utterance.speaker: SHAY
utterance.content: No. And I didn’t ask.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How could Glitch think that cutting the heads off dead bodies would get him back in good with the Westies?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: He wasn’t a deep thinker. I wouldn’t knock myself out looking for motive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Cappuccino?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Rule four.

utterance.speaker: UNIFORM
utterance.content: Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh. Perfect. Thank you. Thank you very much.

utterance.speaker: UNIFORM
utterance.content: Esposito said you’d have something for him?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That – tell him …. Tell him they’re on their way.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. Looks like we got IDs on our heads. All three belong to members of the Trench Town Posse.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well, hot damn. Mystery solved. Trench Town Posse is a Jamaican gang, runs girls and drugs from Brooklyn to the Bronx. Been fighting a turf war with the Westies over the Morningside Heights.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I bet Glitch thought he could make his bones by cutting the heads off of Westie enemies. Bet he planned on puttin those heads in some high ranking Jamaican beds. Like a horse’s head? The Godfather?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s the stupidest thing you’ve said yet. It’s just dumb enough to seem smart to Glitch and knowing that boy, he’d run his mouth, the Jamaicans heard about it and they ambushed him. C’mon.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I got a source on the street tied in with the Jamaicans. He’ll be able to give us intel.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I love this running gun police work.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. Yes, okay? Fine. Yes. I thought that the two of us were actually getting closer together and now it seems like he’s just pulling away.

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: Have you asked him why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes. And he said “oh, everything is fine”.

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: What made you think it isn’t?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Because he’s acting like a complete jackass! He shows up at the precinct with these bimbos hangin’ on his arm and now he’s running around with another cop!

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: Is this other cop a woman?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No! No. What? Why would you even ask that? That’s not even the point. The point is, I don’t understand why he’s acting like this. I mean, what did I do?

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: Well maybe from his point of view, the question is what didn’t you do?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait, what? What – what do you mean?

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: When you were shot, Castle said that he loved you. How long ago was that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Seven months ago, but I wasn’t ready to hear that then.

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: What do you think he’s telling you with his behavior?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That … maybe … he’s not there anymore? That maybe he’s not ready?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What if I waited too long?

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: You weren’t waiting, Kate. You were healing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but then in the meantime, he’s moved on.

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: Or he’s protecting himself by not taking more emotional risks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So then what do I do?

utterance.speaker: BURKE
utterance.content: What do you want to do?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I’d tell you what I do. I’d go all caveman on that partner of yours. Show her what time it is in real man land.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Real man land?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, is that what you were showing Laura when we were back at the morgue?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Just throw a little attention her way. Make her happy. You know who I’m mackin’ on? There’s this hot new redhead, just started working there. Barely street legal.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: A redhead?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: About 5’5”? Blue eyes? Intern?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah. You know her?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s my daughter.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Seriously? That girl’s got an ass –

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Hey! Relax Sherlock. I’m just playing.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. As long as we’re clear my daughter’s off limits.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah. You pack a little punch there, for a writer.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: There’s my guy.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: No, no, no. You stay here. Keep an eye out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I got a name.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What happened? Did you kill him?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You don’t want to know. We were never here.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Jeez!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That guy’s insane.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. I tried to tell you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. He’s insane.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What’d he do?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I can’t talk now.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I want those tickets!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: What’s up? What were you talking about?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We’re … oh, we’re… Nothing. I mean, obviously not nothing. We’re talking. We weren’t just moving our .

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I gotta go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What the hell? I thought you killed him?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You should have seen the look on your face when I came out that door.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s not funny. That’s not funny.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Oh, no. It’s hysterical!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Look at ‘em, laughing it up, just acting like they own the place. I’m gonna say something.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, don’t. It’s not worth it.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I feel like he’s cheating on us.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He’s not cheating on us, Ryan. He’s just – - branching out.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: MARK GIBSON
utterance.content: Don’t take it personally, son. Mark Gibson. I’m undercover on the Gang taskforce.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I had to make sure I could trust you that you’d have my back if things got ugly. Luckily you passed.

utterance.speaker: MARK
utterance.content: Well… you were right about the Jamaicans taking out Glitch. Neighbors near the cemetery heard gunshots the night of the murder. Sources tell me a low level banger names Maxy was the one doing the shooting.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: MARK
utterance.content: He’s holed up in a building on Avenue A and 5th.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Take a walk fellas.

utterance.speaker: GARBAGE MAN
utterance.content: Let’s go, man.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Maxy, why you gotta make this so hard? We both know you killed that Westie kid last night.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: I want me lawyer.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Your lawyer? Sure, he’s right in here.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: Wait!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa … what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Tell me you killed him and we’ll get you out of here, Maxy.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: I didn’t kill no one!

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: Wait, wait, wait! I get a card that some Westie boy was runnin’ his mouth about diggin’ up our dead. We went to the cemetery to ambush him but I never fire no shot.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You better stand back. This guy’s gonna pop like a grape.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: No, wait! I swear! He wasn’t alone. A group of Mexican’s was waiting there next to a tricked out Escalade.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Are you telling me a 3rd gang is involved in this?

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: Man, I don’t know who they are, man! But that Glitch clearly knew them. He told him he had the heads, then things went south. The Mexicans opened fire on him, him took off running, and so did I.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay. So the Mexicans hunted down Glitch and they shot him.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Or he did and he’s making up a story.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: No! No, no, no, no. I can prove it! The Escalade had Texas plates. I saw the first 2 letters. R and X.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Okay Maxy. But that license better check out or I’m gonna come back here and recycle your ass.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Bye bye.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: Slaughter! Get me out of here!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Another gang? That’s plausible, right?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yep. You threaten enough guys, you get a feel for their honesty.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: But you wouldn’t have really crushed him?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Oh, ‘course not. Would have been more like a … mangling.

utterance.speaker: MAXY
utterance.content: Slaughter!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Detective Ryan.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s Castle. I’ve got a partial Texas plate I need you to run. First letters R and X.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, Castle. That’s going to be really tough for me. I’m pretty busy.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really? You too, huh?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Get the Ferrari.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You know Castle? Jenny’s been bugging me to set you up with her cousin Ramona. She’s a dental hygienist.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Mmhmm. Sounds good.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Ferrari.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: And I want the Ferrari for the weekend.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. Hey, and buddy? I’m never gonna forget this. All right. We’re all set.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: All right. We’ll get the results in the morning. Tonight we celebrate.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Celebrate what?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You survives the first day on the job with me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well did you ever have a partner that didn’t?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know, I’d love to … ah… celebrate, but –

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: But what?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: But … nothing. But nothing. Let’s - - let’s do this. What’s the worst that can happen, right?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS CASTLE
utterance.content: Dad, I got in! I got in!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh… where?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Almost everywhere, so far.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Oxford, Princeton, Sarah Lawrence.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s great, honey. I knew it would work out.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Then why were you hiding the letters from me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: C’mon, Dad. I can read a postmark. Some of these came last week.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh. I just – I’m sorry. Honey, I’m just trying to protect you.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I’m 18 now. You need to trust that I can take care of my- … – myself.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I got into Stanford.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Yes! Oh, great! That’s always been your first choice, right?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And yet I sense trouble.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I – I don’t know. I mean, I should be happy. But after they shot me down for early admission …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: They rejected you and now you feel betrayed.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: How am I supposed to get over that?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You look like crap. Here. A little hair of the dog. That’ll get you flyin’ right.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. That’s not going to do anything but turn back time. Anyway, where are we going?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Salvage yard in the Bronx. I ran that Texas plate myself last night. Turns out Maxy was telling the truth about the 3rd player. Escalade was registered to a Cesar Vales. Runs with a Mexican gang. Rumor has it they’re making runs in New York trying to corner the market on the city’s crack trade.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So Vales is coming into town trying to muscle in on the Westies and the Jamaicans.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah. Which ain’t exactly easy to do.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well it would be a lot easier if he could get them to take each other out.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: That’s good. So he’s sitting around, trying to think about a way to make that happen and overhears Glitch runnin’ his mouth.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Right. He realizes if a Westie was to turn up murdered with a bag full of Jamaican heads both sides would go to war.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: And they could jump in and take over the territories.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Are you sure it’s such a good idea to go after this guy ourselves? Maxy made him sound pretty dangerous.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Piece of cake. Guy’s nothing but a two bit punk.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: He’s high level Mexican mafia, about as dangerous as they come. According to the DEA, Cesar Vales is suspected in the deaths of over a dozen people, including three cops in Mexico who were killed with a sledgehammer and then cut up into pieces.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You don’t think Castle and Slaughter are going after them?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’d put money on it ‘cause I wasn’t the only ones who ran his plates last night. Slaughter did too.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: If Castle and Slaughter go after this guy they’re gonna both end up dead. We need to warn Castle.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I tried. But his phone keeps going to voicemail. I got a bad feeling that they’re on their way to take down Vales right now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re not going to mangle anyone today, are you?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I like to keep my options open.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There’s an awful lot of them.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Just follow my lead. Hola gentlemen. On behalf of the NYPD I’d like to welcome you to the greatest city on God’s green Earth.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Unless you want your friends to see what the inside of your head looks like, back off.

utterance.speaker: CESER VALES
utterance.content: Ah ha. Now what seems to be the problem, Officer?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You Vales?

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: That’s me.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: The name Michael Riley mean anything to you? AKA Glitch?

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: No. I’m afraid not.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: That’s funny. Because I got an eyewitness who puts you and your girls here shooting the hell out of him in Queens two nights ago.

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: That is funny. Hey, you. Where’s your badge?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: In his other coat.

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah, Vales. We know all about your plan.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You use Glitch to spark a gang war so you can move your drug business into New York.

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: Wow. Your partner here, he’s pretty high strung, isn’t he?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah. High strung.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa…

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: NYPD!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: NYPD, let me see your hands!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Party’s over.

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: That’s too bad, because this was just getting interesting.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: If I were you I’d get your affairs in order because I’ll be back.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey! Slaughter! Going in there without backup? Putting a civilian in harm’s way? That’s not only reckless, that is bad police work.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You’re just lucky we traced Castle’s phone and found you guys in time.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You think I’m going to thank you for almost ruining my play?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You had a play?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I always have a play. Had to escalate things. Try to find the weak member of the herd.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That kid.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Exactly. He’s the one I’m gonna get the flip on Vales, once I figure out how to separate him from the pack.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Who knew all these years we’ve been working together that you had a death wish.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What, that? That wasn’t bad. Slaughter had a plan.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, he had a plan to get you killed.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s Slaughter. I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right. Next time we might not be there to save you.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You gotta do something.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Espo, if the guy’s hell bent on leaving the nest then there’s nothing that I can do about it.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You don’t really feel that way, do you?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: You don’t listen to those whiners, Sherlock. You got balls. And yeah, I may have needlessly put you in a little harm’s way there with Vales, but seeing as it paid off?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What do you mean, paid off?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What was that?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO MENDOZA
utterance.content: Hey, c’mon man! This ain’t cool!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Is there someone in the trunk?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Gilberto Mendoza, our weak link.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Get me the hell out of here, man!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Please tell me that we are just going to talk to him.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah, pretty much.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: You can’t do this!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This is wrong. You gotta stop.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Not ‘til he flips on Vales. Hear that Gilberto? The only way you’re getting out of that trunk is if you rat out your boss.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Well guess what? I’m not sayin’ nothing!

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Hey, you remember that favor you promised me? There’s a civilian review board thing coming up. Excessive force complaints. Total BS, right?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Anyway, you being a friend of the Mayor and all, I figure a statement from you’d go a long way at making those charges go away, right?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re crazy.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Is that a no?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’ll do it! I’ll do it if you stop.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Outstanding. Next Tuesday. 9AM sharp. I’ll send you an email.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Hey man, I know my rights, all right? This is kidnapping. Police abuse.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Uh huh. I know something too, Gilberto. You got a brother in juvie back in Texas. Poor little Hector. I hear he cries himself to sleep every night.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. What the hell are you doing?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Just having a little chat here with Gilberto. Listen, unless you want something very bad to happen to Hector you’re gonna help me bury Vales, aren’t you? Aren’t you?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Okay, what? I need to hear the magic words.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Vales killed Glitch.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Vales killed Glitch. Yes. Victory.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Vales was looking for a way to take over the Jamaicans and the Westies turf. That’s when we heard about this punk ass Westie trying to prove himself and Vales saw his chance. He convinced Glitch that if he dug up a couple of Jamaicans and cut off their heads it would get him back in tight with his Westie pals.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: So Vales wanted to use the heads to spark a gang war? For the Westies and Jamaicans to go at it until no one’s left standing and then he waltzes in and takes over the territory?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: What went down at the cemetery?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Vales got Glitch to dig up the bodies. The plan was to kill him and make it look like the Jamaicans did it. And Glitch must have sensed it or something, because he took off as soon as we opened fire.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Tell me about the murder. Look, kid. I know you’re scared. I was a little rough. But I talked to the DA and the Feds, they said you cooperate with me your brother’s sentence will be reduced to time served and both of you get a free ride in WitSec. So, tell me how it went down.

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: We chased him. We cornered him.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Under the overpass?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: And then Vales shot him twice and just left him for dead.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: How many times?

utterance.speaker: GILBERTO
utterance.content: Three. He shot him three times.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What do you think you’re doing?

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Closing this case. I got an arrest warrant for Vales burning an hole in my pocket.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You coached that kid through his interrogation.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Nah, nah. I just refreshed his recollection.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really? Because the way he was talking he didn’t even witness that murder.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Hey. Vales has bodies on him like you wouldn’t believe: women, children, cops. I got a chance to put him away and I’m gonna take it. The question is, are you in or out?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I guess I’m out.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well that’s a shame. I had high hopes for you, Sherlock. Never thought you’d punk out on me like this.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. I need some help.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Sorry Castle, caught a murder.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Talk to Beckett.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. How’s it going?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You can skip the small talk, Castle. What do you want?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Slaughter went to far.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well isn’t that what he does? Along with kicking ass and taking names?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He pressured a kid into making a false statement so he could arrest Vales.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So you came to me so I can fix it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You have every right to be mad. You warned me about Slaughter and I wouldn’t listen. I’m just trying to make this right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s not my case, Castle. Even if I wanted to help we’ve got strict rules about interfering in another cop’s investigation.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m not asking you to do it for me. I’m asking you to do it so the real killer doesn’t get away with murder.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What makes you think I’m actually going to fall for that blatant manipulation?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Because it’s true.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What’s this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: A traffic cam shot of Vales’s car 10 blocks from the cemetery heading away from the overpass where Glitch was killed.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: 11:57. Glitch was killed after midnight. This shows that Vales couldn’t have killed him. You did this for me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All this time you had my back.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I had Ryan run a traffic cam search while he was pulling a plate? It’s not a smoking gun, Castle, okay? You can’t even see Vales’s face in that photo. It’s not enough to change Slaughter’s mind unless you’ve got something else.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There is one more thing that doesn’t make sense. This is a map of the area. This is the cemetery, this is the overpass. But to get to it Glitch would have to climb a six foot fence. Why do that when there’s a subway station a block away? Why hide when you can run?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Maybe we can find out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: According to the CSU report Glitch was shot somewhere around here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh huh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He staggered away and ended up on the other side of that pillar.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So you think Vales’s plan was to use Glitch and the Jamaican heads to start up a gang war?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know, Castle. That’s not what I’m seeing. Let’s say I’m Vales and I shoot Glitch to start that war. Where do you think would be the best spot to drop off that body?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: In the middle of Westie territory.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Exactly. So why did he leave it here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, crap.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Well! Imagine my surprise when I got to the station with my killer and I hear you’re stirring up my crime scene!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, look. I can explain –

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Save it. He don’t know any better but you do.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What I know is that you coerced a confession out of an 18 year old kid.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: I didn’t coerce jack. He works for a guy that’s got a trail of bodies that stretches all the way back to the Rio Grande. If he doesn’t go down for this the body count just grows.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We got a traffic video photo of Vales’s Escalade 10 block from here when the murder went down.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah, so what? Could you see him in the car?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Not exactly.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: And if his lawyer gets a hold of it you’ve handed him reasonable doubt. And then Vales walks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe he deserves to walk.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: He deserves to be pulled apart by horses, but the law says I can’t do that. But what I can do is I can lock him up in prison for the rest of his life. Now the question is, are you gonna back off or am I going to have to report you for jumping my case?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You do what you gotta do, Slaughter. And I’ll do the same.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Wow. Wow.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We got about an hour to figure out who really killed Glitch before I get called on the carpet by the Chief of Detectives.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What can he do to you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, best case scenario he suspends me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And the worst case scenario?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Crap.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So I’m Glitch. I just dug up three bodies, cut the heads off, which was horrible, to try and win my way back in with the Westies. And then the kindly Mexican gentlemen that I thought were helping me suddenly pull out guns and try to kill me. Running for my life I end up on the wrong side of this fence.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where you can see a sign for the subway. So why would you climb a barbed wire fence when you can just hang a right and hop a train out of here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Fear. For all I know, the Mexicans are driving the streets looking for me. With all these street lights on I’d be a sitting duck. But under here it would be pitch black. So I climb the fence and I hide.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Why hide when you can escape?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Because I wasn’t just hiding. I was waiting. I called for help. But when they found Glitch’s body he didn’t have a phone on him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So … either the killer took it or –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Or he used that pay phone,

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Why did you call me down here?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Because we have definitive proof that Vales didn’t kill Glitch.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: And you want to rub my face in it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, Slaughter. We’re different kinds of cops.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And although I’m not a fan of your methods, I know you don’t want to send an innocent man to jail when you know that the real killer is still out there.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: ‘kay. So who killed Glitch?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We know he called you, Brian. Your son dialed your cell from that pay phone about a half an hour before he was murdered and you answered that call. We also have surveillance photos of you at that subway stop from before and after the murder.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: All those years, all those screw-ups. Must have been unbearable for a standup guy like you, huh, Brian?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then Glitch calls to tell you he screwed up. Again. But this time it was different, wasn’t it?

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: He crossed a line.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He was your son.

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: Which made him my responsibility. So I did what had to be done.

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: He wasn’t even surprised. ‘twas if he was waiting for it his whole life.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Why didn’t you take the heads? That way none of this’d come back on you and the Westies?

utterance.speaker: BRIAN
utterance.content: He vanished into the dark after I shot him. Even with his last breath the boy managed to screw me up.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, at least you finally get a conviction on Brian. That’s got to be a consolation.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Vales still walks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Excuse me. Counselor! Can I speak to your client for a second?

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: She probably wants an autograph.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You feel cocky. I get it. You just dodged a murder rap. Probably going to go out tonight and celebrate and you should. Paint the town. But then, in the morning, I want you to get the hell out of my city.

utterance.speaker: VALES
utterance.content: But I like it here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You might like it right now. But starting tomorrow you’re going to see just how hard a city New York can be when the full force of the NYPD comes crashing down on you with 30,000 making it your daily duty to make your life a living hell.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Counselor, you can take him away now.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Oh, that is sexy.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: What? You want to hit me for that, too?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: That’s for not having my back. Oh, and if I ever see a character in one of your books like me, we’re going to have words. So I’m going to see you at the hearing on Tuesday, right?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You got it.

utterance.speaker: SLAUGHTER
utterance.content: Outstanding. Detective. If you ever want to go on a date that ends in sex after a drunken fistfight, you know where to find me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, in Never Gonna Happen Land.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. Thanks very much for your help.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No problem, Castle. It’s what partners are supposed to do.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah. Basking in the glory of you?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: No. Just trying to figure out what to do. Stanford has always been my dream school but what if their initial rejection was the universe sending me a sign? That I’m better off somewhere else?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You think you’d be better off somewhere else?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I don’t know. Do you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t know either. I guess the question is, do you want it badly enough to get over being hurt? You know what I think would help with this decision?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Ice cream.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ice cream.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Race you.
